name: Restic REST Server
description: Fast, secure backup server for Restic. Efficient deduplication and encryption.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  restic:
    image: restic/rest-server:latest
    container_name: restic-server
    restart: unless-stopped
    command:
      - --path
      - /data
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:8000"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/data
    environment:
      - OPTIONS=--append-only
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=restic"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=backup"

notes: Use restic CLI to connect: restic -r rest:http://your-ip:8000/
Backups are encrypted by Restic client
